title: Solitary drinking is America’s hidden alcohol problem
itunes:title: Solitary drinking is America’s hidden alcohol problem
description:
Kamala Harris is visiting Guatemala and Mexico in her first trip abroad as vice president. Politico and the Los Angeles Times examine the stakes.

The U.S. housing market does not have enough homes listed for sale to meet demand. The Wall Street Journal explains how “whisper listings” might be making matters worse.

When it comes to alcohol, America tends to swing between extremes of indulgence and temperance. The Atlantic draws on research and history to look into whether the problem may be not just how much Americans drink, but how often they drink alone.

NBC Sports has the story of the latest big win for gymnast Simone Biles.
